Python.name: Python
Python.description: Python is an interpreted high-level programming language for general-purpose programming. Python has a design philosophy that emphasizes code readability, notably using significant whitespace. It provides constructs that enable clear programming on both small and large scales.
Python.creator: Guido van Rossum

cobra.name: Cobra
cobra.description: Cobras are large and diverse group of snakes. There are 270 different types of cobras.
cobra.location: Africa, Asia and Australia, usually in forests and areas near river.

anaconda.name: Anaconda
anaconda.description: Anacondas are the largest and heaviest known snakes. There are 4 types of anacondas.
anaconda.location: Tropical rainforests, lakes and swamps of South America. Anacondas are especially numerous near Amazon and Orinoco rivers.
